messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Delivery Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, not more than 15 mice have descended into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
High levels of fun detected around station.

Elevation of security level may be needed.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Art Supply Storage.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Levels of fun reaching dangerous levels.

Anti-fun response supplies inbound.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
System error. Fun levels over capacity.

Response team mobilising.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: No personnel detected on shuttle. Emergency bluespace retrieval protocol active.
